meanings.sent1: When you press the spring, it will resile quickly.
meanings.sent2: The rubber band will resile when you release it.
meanings.sent3: The ball resiled off the wall and hit me in the face!

meanings.sent5: The memory resiled in his mind like a boomerang.

meanings.sent1: The cat will resile if you move too quickly towards it.
meanings.sent2: He tends to resile from unfamiliar situations.

meanings.sent1: The army had to resile due to the unexpected attack.
